name: Feed 'em Up!
description:
CONTROLS:

w, a, s, d = move

left mouse button = shoot

1, 2, 3 = change ammo (1=burger, 2=burrito, 3=pizza)

DESCRIPTION:

A top down, shoot 'em up, zombie survival, restaurant simulator.

You are a chef in a busy restaurant trying to serve as many customers  as possible to make as much money as you can!

Really enjoyed taking part in this jam, even though I had a lot of technical issues throughout.

Didn't get to add everything I wanted but I'm still happy with how it turned out.

BUGS:

its is quite buggy... sorry

The customers can walk through walls a bit. This is my first time using this nav mesh system.

There is an invincibility glitch I've ran into, but I don't know the cause.
